In England, in the seven days to 01 June, there were 21,026 new confirmed cases (37.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 May, there were 14,511 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 45% (6,515 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 June is 3,940,141 (7,000.1 cases per 100,000 population).
